comments_since_last_sample.body: The demasculation of men has been slithering through society for years. Part of the a gen da.

Toxic masculinity is the enemy here, not masculinity. Which by the way means something diffrent to everyone. What I find masculine might not seem masculine to someone else. For example hunting does not make you a man, not crying does not make you a man (stupid), cooking does not make you less of a man. Cleaning does not make you less of a man. I can go on and on. Obviously yall don't know what toxic masculinity is. Thinking a household is blessed because the first born is a boy. Thinking God created women for the men. That stuff is what is bad. PEOPLE stop being stupid. It's annoying.

OML a female that understands this crap AMAZING teach the rest of your sisters ! I am 100% what feminists & lefties HATE ! A good OLD masculine alpha male that will do ANYTHING to protect women & children of ANY decent society & allied countries. 1 of the last dinosaurs right here, Exactly what society has relied on to save their citizens in times of war. Let's see how fast these loser woke idiots change their views next time their country & safety is in threat OR do they think they can rely on their ABDEFGHIGAYLK+++++ people to save them lol Heads up they won't wanna break their fingernails your gunna be screaming for real men 100% !
oof, woman don't need no man. strong and independent

Unfortunately women have vilified “good men” as being weak, soft, boring, and corny. You wanna know why that black dude got away with hitting that woman? Because women have also uplifted the “bad man” as strong, exciting, and a sight to behold. Women, especially those of the womanist movement, have also made it difficult for men to step in without facing retaliation for assisting. In the end, as the angle pointed out, it’s still the women who lose and it’s unfortunate.
